page.title: 14HOUSING
page.content:
HOUSING
{COUNCIL HOUSING
The location of the council housing estate that we were studying was east of the Forest School.The estate is located here because of good communications and practical amenities i.e. shops,schools,churches,public houses and petrol stations.On the estate there are thirty-five semi-detached houses thirteen built in 1941 and twenty-two in 1976.These houses are ocupied mainly by manual labourers.These houses are made up of six rooms,three bedrooms,one bathroom a dining room/living room and a kitchen. On average the families on the estate are oversized.
